1.0 Knowledge and understanding.Course Learning Outcome: Recognize the importance of nutrition and its role in improving human health.

1. Field Experience Flowchart for Respon.Title: Field Experience Flowchart for Responsibility
1. Field Experience Flowchart for Respon.Description: Including units, departments, and committees responsible for field experience identifying by the interrelations.
1. Field Experience Flowchart for Respon.Note: There is a flowchart image for this section.

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Area/Issue: Strategies for obtaining feedback from students on teaching effectiveness
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluator:
Students
Classroom Observation by teacher
Teaching and Learning Committee
Faculty Vice dean for Development
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
At the end of each term, field experience evaluations should be submitted by students
Evaluate students’ opinions about the topics by asking critical related questions during the lectures or department/faculty meeting.

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Area/Issue: Other strategies for evaluating the teaching process by the professor or the department
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluator:
Curriculum and Test Development Unit
Curriculum Committee
Teaching and Learning Committee
Assessment Committee
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
-Periodical discussions of course reports with staff members in the food and nutrition department
-Peer consultation on teaching
-Periodical group discussions of faculty teaching the course

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluator:
Faculty Vice deans for Development
Teaching and Learning Committee
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
Updating the content of the courses periodically as needed.
Taking Diploma of professional development in teaching and learning to enhance faculty skills in the area of education and teaching.
Monitoring of teaching activates by senior faculty members.
Attending training courses and exchange experiences between faculty staff members
Periodical evaluation from the department for teaching strategies and teaching assessment methods

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Area/Issue: Procedures for verifying student achievement standards (such as:
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method: -Providing samples from students work and the assessment in the

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Area/Issue: checking the correction of a sample of student work by independent faculty members, and periodically exchanging to correct exams or sample assignments with faculty members from another institution)
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluator:
Teaching and Learning Committee
Vice Dean for Development
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
departmental course Portfolio with rubric and key answers.
Assigning group of faculty members teaching the same course to grade same
questions for various students.
Conducting electronic standard exams.

Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Area/Issue: Planning procedures for the periodic review of the effectiveness of the course and planning for its development
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluator:
Curriculum Committee
Teaching and Learning Committee
Assessment Committee
Training Quality Evaluation.Evaluation Method:
-Every semester, the Education and Learning, Academic Accreditation and Curriculum Development Committees will review the course report and identify strengths, weaknesses, and improvement plans and discuss how to update all courses accordingly
The course material and learning outcomes are periodically reviewed and the changes to be taken are approved in the department and higher council.
The head of department and faculty take the responsibility of implementing the proposed changes.
